summary: The BuildRequest specifies a promotion-only publish retry with no code/config changes, but the diff includes substantial backend application code changes unrelated to publishing/promotion and a project state metadata update.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/modified backend application logic for game/crafting catalog types and query APIs (e.g., CraftableItem, Game, getGames/getItems/searchItems/getProductionItems, production flag).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest has no feature requirements and explicitly constrains the change to a promotion-only publish operation without rebuilding or modifying code; these backend logic changes are unrelated to a publish/promotion retry.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/state file (project name/state version) not related to promotion-only publishing.
hallucinated_features.reason: No request was made to change project metadata; the task is solely to retry promoting the existing draft artifact to production without code/config changes.
